channel.title: ethereum on Natalie Chin
channel.description: Recent content in ethereum on Natalie Chin

item.title: Flash Loans: An Initial Analysis
item.description: For the past few weeks (or months?), I kept seeing tweets about flash loans in my Twitter feed. Recently, I’d been spending a lot more of my time trying to better understand the translation of code to bytecode, but I finally had some time to spare to learn more about flash loans and how they differ from more “traditional loans”, like Compound and Maker, two giants in the decentralized finance space.

item.title: Solidity Function Visibility Specifications and Built-In Modifiers
item.description: What’s the difference between Solidity Function Visibility (public, external, private, internal)? When should you use one over the other? How do you know when to use Solidity Modifiers (pure, view)? Read more to find out!

item.title: Automated Eth Wrapping
item.description: How to make a contract auto wrap and unwrap ETH

item.title: Smart Contract Security
item.description: Storing your cryptocurrency in a private wallet vs a smart contract wallet
